effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to begin a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of Overpower by 5%, stacking up to 10 times. 
Overpower has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends you gain 2% Haste and your Mortal Strike and Cleave damage is increased by 2% per stack of Winning Streak! you had for 12 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 421 Strength up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 112,577 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 168,875.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of Cheerful Flowers

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

name: Personal Tabard
description: Visit Personal Tabard Designers in Stormwind, Orgrimmar, or Valdrakken to change your personal tabard design.
